title: Is it a common Pixel 3XL issue for Bluetooth to continually disconnect from a PC?
content: The Bluetooth performance is unsatisfactory for my Pixel 3XL. My battery drains quickly when it is enabled and it doesn't maintain a connection with my Windows PC. It shows it in my previous devices but it barely stays connected for more than a few seconds.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
